content:
I posted this #implementers > What is the state of FHIR CSV export? , and was recommended to move it here. It's getting lots of good feedback on #implementers that I don't want to risk deleting (new to Zulip) so I'll just link it from this stream.

Long story short, trying to understand what code is already available for converting FHIR back to a flat table with one row per patient-encounter, one column per variable, time-invariant values repeating.
the link didn't work for me, so here's one that does: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/What.20is.20the.20state.20of.20FHIR-.3ECSV.20export.3F
